entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
